name: multiview-chrome
description: Multiview is a browser addon that lets you embed any website into a split page view.
author: Kauko <kauko@biosynth.link>

scripts.build:src: parcel build src/*.html src/background.ts src/oauth_handler.ts src/picarto_frame_handler.ts --no-source-maps
scripts.watch: parcel watch src/*.html src/background.ts src/oauth_handler.ts src/picarto_frame_handler.ts
